content: round 6 knit across all stitches round 7 *k2tog* until end of round 12 14 16 18 20 22 round 8 *k2tog* until end of round 6 7 8 9 10 11 for adult m & xl sizes only round 9 k1 *k2tog* until end - - - 5 - 6 cut yarn leaving an 8 tail and gather up remaining stitches with tapestry needle and weave in ends thank you and i hope you enjoy your new bankhead if you have any questions please email me at susie@knitnatural com follow me for patterns tutorials and so much more at www knitnatural com
